document.full_text: the world's biggest coffee shop chain starbucks corp will boost the cost of its packaged coffee for the second time since march, but this time it will take place in its own u.s. stores and by a steep 17 percent.
document.title: starbucks to raise packaged coffee price by 17 percent
lines_and_colors: the world's biggest coffee shop chain starbucks corp will boost the cost of its packaged coffee for the second time since march, but this time it will take place in its own u.s. stores and by a steep 17 percent.
